00020 
00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 
00026 using Niry;
00027 using Niry.Utils;
00028 using Niry.Network;
00029 using Niry.GUI.Gtk2;
00030 
00031 using NyFolder;
00032 using NyFolder.Utils;
00033 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00034 using NyFolder.GUI.Base;
00035 
00036 namespace NyFolder.GUI {
00037     public delegate void SendFileHandler (object sender, UserInfo userInfo, string path);
00038 
00040     public class NetworkViewer : RefreshableViewer {
00041         // ============================================
00042         // PUBLIC Events
00043         // ============================================
00044         public event PeerSelectedHandler UserLoggedOut = null;
00045         public event PeerSelectedHandler UserLoggedIn = null;
00046         public event PeerSelectedHandler ItemActivated = null;
00047         public event PeerSelectedHandler ItemRemoved = null;
00048         public event BlankEventHandler RefreshPeers = null;
00049         public event RightMenuHandler RightMenu = null;
00050         public event SendFileHandler SendFile = null;
00051         
00052         // ============================================
00053         // PROTECTED Members
00054         // ============================================
00055         protected NetworkStore store;
00056 
00057         // ============================================
00058         // PRIVATE Members
00059         // ============================================
00060 
00061         // ============================================
00062         // PUBLIC Constructors
00063         // ============================================
00064         public NetworkViewer() {
00065             // Initialize Network Store
00066             this.store = new NetworkStore();
00067 
00068             // Initialize Icon View
00069             iconView = new IconView(store);
00070             iconView.TextColumn = NetworkStore.COL_NAME;
00071             iconView.PixbufColumn = NetworkStore.COL_PIXBUF;
00072             iconView.SelectionMode = SelectionMode.Single;
00073 
00074             // Initialize Icon View Events
00075             iconView.ItemActivated += new ItemActivatedHandler(OnItemActivated);
00076             iconView.ButtonPressEvent += new ButtonPressEventHandler(OnItemClicked);
00077 
00078             // Initialize Icon View Drag & Drop
00079             iconView.EnableModelDragDest(Dnd.TargetTable, Gdk.DragAction.Copy);
00080             iconView.DragDataReceived += new DragDataReceivedHandler(OnDragDataReceived);
00081 
00082             // Add IconView to ScrolledWindow
00083             Add(iconView);
00084         }
00085 
00086         // ============================================
00087         // PUBLIC Methods
00088         // ============================================
00090         public override void Refresh() {
00091             store.Clear();
00092 
00093             if (P2PManager.KnownPeers != null &&
00094                 P2PManager.KnownPeers.Count > 0)
00095             {
00096                 foreach (UserInfo userInfo in P2PManager.KnownPeers.Keys)
00097                     store.Add(userInfo);
00098             }
00099 
00100             if (RefreshPeers != null) RefreshPeers(this);
00101         }
00102 
00104         public void Add (UserInfo userInfo) {
00105             store.Add(userInfo);
00106 
00107             // Raise User Logged In Event
00108             if (userInfo.IsOnline == true && UserLoggedIn != null)
00109                 UserLoggedIn(this, userInfo);
00110         }
00111 
00113         public void Remove (UserInfo userInfo) {
00114             // Raise User Logged Out Event
00115             if (UserLoggedOut != null) 
00116                 UserLoggedOut(this, userInfo);
00117 
00118             store.Remove(userInfo);
00119         }
00120 
00122         public void RemoveAll() {
00123             store.Clear();
00124         }
00125 
00127         public UserInfo GetUserInfo (string username) {
00128             foreach (object[] row in this.store) {
00129                 UserInfo userInfo = (UserInfo) row[NetworkStore.COL_USER_INFO];
00130                 if (userInfo.Name == username) return(userInfo);
00131             }
00132             return(null);
00133         }
00134 
00135         // ============================================
00136         // PROTECTED (Methods) Event Handlers
00137         // ============================================
00138         protected void OnDragDataReceived (object sender, DragDataReceivedArgs args) {
00139             IconViewDropPosition pos;
00140             TreePath path;          
00141 
00142             // Get Dest Item Position
00143             if (iconView.GetDestItemAtPos(args.X, args.Y, out path, out pos) == false) {
00144                 Drag.Finish(args.Context, false, false, args.Time);
00145                 return;
00146             }
00147 
00148             // Select Item (Change Icon To Activate it)
00149             UserInfo userInfo = store.GetUserInfo(path);
00150             if (userInfo.IsOnline == false) {
00151                 Drag.Finish(args.Context, false, false, args.Time);
00152                 return;
00153             }
00154 
00155             // Get Drop Paths
00156             object[] filesPath = Dnd.GetDragReceivedPaths(args);
00157             foreach (string filePath in filesPath) {
00158                 Debug.Log("Send To '{0}' URI: '{1}'", userInfo.Name, filePath);
00159                 if (SendFile != null) SendFile(this, userInfo, filePath);
00160             }
00161 
00162             Drag.Finish(args.Context, true, false, args.Time);
00163         }
00164 
00165         protected void OnItemActivated (object sender, ItemActivatedArgs args) {
00166             UserInfo userInfo = store.GetUserInfo(args.Path);
00167             if (userInfo == null) return;
00168             if (userInfo.IsOnline == false) return;
00169             if (ItemActivated != null) ItemActivated(this, userInfo);
00170         }
00171 
00172         protected void OnNetRemove (object sender, EventArgs args) {
00173             foreach (TreePath treePath in iconView.SelectedItems) {
00174                 UserInfo userInfo = store.GetUserInfo(treePath);
00175                 if (userInfo == null) continue;
00176                 if (userInfo.IsOnline == false) continue;
00177                 if (ItemRemoved != null) ItemRemoved(this, userInfo);
00178             }
00179         }
00180 
00181         protected void OnItemClicked (object sender, ButtonPressEventArgs args) {
00182             if (iconView.SelectedItems.Length <= 0)
00183                 return;
00184 
00185             if (args.Event.Device.Source != Gdk.InputSource.Mouse)
00186                 return;
00187 
00188             if (args.Event.Button == 3) {
00189                 PopupMenu menu = new PopupMenu();
00190 
00191                 // Options
00192                 menu.AddImageItem(Gtk.Stock.Remove, new EventHandler(OnNetRemove));
00193 
00194                 // Start Right Menu Event
00195                 if (RightMenu != null) RightMenu(this, menu);
00196 
00197                 menu.Popup();
00198                 menu.ShowAll();
00199             }
00200         }
00201 
00202         // ============================================
00203         // PRIVATE Methods
00204         // ============================================
00205 
00206         // ============================================
00207         // PUBLIC Properties
00208         // ============================================
00210         public NetworkStore Store {
00211             get { return(this.store); }
00212         }
00213     }
00214 }
